name: f1-picks
description: F1 prediction game with real-time scoring

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run lint --workspace=frontend -- --fix && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt -r dev-requirements.txt
